name: BeoLivingIntelligenceskillbyKhimo
0:
”Alexa, change channel to 100 on Kitchen TV”
”Alexa, dim Kitchen lights by 90 percent”
”Alexa, activate Welcome scene”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using this skill you will be able to control Bang & Olufsen products, lights, shades, thermostats and scenes that are supported by the BeoLiving Intelligence and configured at your home. 

In order to use this skill, BeoLiving Intelligence should be correctly installed and configured to use the Khimo.com remote access service. Please contact your local Bang & Olufsen retailer for more information.

Devices name depends on how your BeoLiving Intelligence is configured. If there are unique zone names in the configuration, each device name will be composed by the zone name where the device is present followed by the device name in the BeoLiving Intelligence configuration.

For example, if your BeoLiving Intelligence have Bang & Olufsen audio/video products in your Kitchen called "Essence" and "TV", then Alexa should have access to the device "Kitchen Essence" and "Kitchen TV". In this case, you could try:
 - Alexa, change channel to 100 on Kitchen TV
 - Alexa, turn off Kitchen Essence
 - Alexa, set volume to 40 on Kitchen Essence
 
If you have a "Good Night" scene configured in your Bedroom, then Alexa should have access to the "Bedroom Good Night scene" device. So, you can try:
 - Alexa, activate Bedroom Good Night scene

If you have a dimmer in your Bathroom, you can try:
 - Alexa, turn on Bathroom lights
 - Alexa, set Bathroom lights to 60 percent
 - Alexa, turn off Bathroom lights

If you have a thermostat device on your Living room, you can try:
 - Alexa, turn off Living room thermostat
 - Alexa, set Living room thermostat to 26
 - Alexa, set Living room thermostat to Automatic
 - Alexa, set Living room thermostat to Eco
 - Alexa, set Living room thermostat to Heat


Please, let us know how it is working for you and let us know of any issue at the following email: support+alexa@khimo.com
